title: conferred on me by section 37(6) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998)
heading: 3. Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2017 is amended by the insertion of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2017 is amended by the insertion of 

the following paragraph after paragraph (5): 

“(5A) Any allowance payable, as part of the terms and conditions 
relating to remuneration determined by the Minister in accordance with 
paragraph (4), to a person appointed on or after 1 September 2017 as a 
Director of an education support centre shall be payable to the person for 
so long only as he or she stands appointed as such a Director.”.

title: conferred on me by section 37(6) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998)
heading: 4. Regulation 6 of the Regulations of 2017 is amended –
text_raw:
4. Regulation 6 of the Regulations of 2017 is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (1), by the substitution of “Subject to paragraph 
(1A), where the appointment” for “Where the appointment”, and 

(b) by the insertion of the following paragraph: 

“(1A) Paragraph (1) shall not apply 
the 
appointment of a Director for a school year where the continued 
appointment of the Director was approved by the Minister – 

in respect of 

(a) 

in accordance with paragraph (1) for 
the 4 
consecutive years immediately prior to that school 
year, or 

(b) 

in accordance with – 

(i) 

paragraph (1) for the 3 consecutive years 
immediately prior to that school year, and 

(ii) paragraph (10) for the year immediately prior 

to those 3 consecutive years.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5. Regulation 11(6) of the Regulations of 2017 is amended by the 

substitution of “10 consecutive years” for “5 consecutive years”.
